resources.string: This luxurious villa offers a sanctuary of serenity nestled in a prime location with breathtaking ocean views. With 5 en-suite bedrooms, this exceptional residence offers contemporary design, high-end finishes and state-of-the-art equipment. A spa, private gym and infinity pool complete this architectural gem. The elegance of its vast open living spaces blends harmoniously with the outdoor terraces and the landscaped garden. A unique property that combines luxury, comfort and tranquility. To enter without delay.
Format the date in french version
